title: The Right instrument?
creator_credit: Alasdair Clayre, Open University and BBC-TV
brief_description: Gerald Hendrie talks about authenticity of text and performance in music and illustrates his argument with performances of Bach’s and Handel’s music on clavichord, harpsichord, piano, 17th century organ and “romantic” organ.
